---
title: "Module submission instructions"
---

## Overview

We will use GitHub for submitting module deliverables. The submission steps are:

1.  Create your own *remote* repo on GitHub from the module template repo.
2.  Create your *local* repo by cloning your remote to your computer. Edit your local repo to complete the module deliverable.
3.  *Commit* your changes in the local repo.
4.  *Push* your local commit to the remote repo.
5.  Open an *Issue* on GitHub and tag the instructors.
